source.693a2178: ### Which seasons have the highest IMDb ratings?
source.3d2248cf: It looks like the series was fairly consistent overall. The episode ratings generally trend up within each season, and seasons 1 and 4 each had particularly good final episodes. That coincides with a very big reveal at the end of season 1, and a very satisfying series finale that wraps up a lot of storylines from the series.
source.a8ab47de: Series creator [Michael Schur](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Schur) has the best average rating among writers. It's worth noting that no individual or pair wrote more than 4 episodes of the show.

source.336a0eee: Michael Schur is at the top of this list as well. This is not surprising, since he mostly directed the same episodes that he wrote.
